page.title: 09A 10 Year Old Boy's Day
page.content: A typical day in my life is a school day. I get up at 7.30am, have a wash, brush my teeth and have my breakfast. I go to school at 8.40am and play football with my class on our field. When the bell rings we go into the classroom.On Wednesdays we have an assembly to show work from other classes. After assembly we have play time for twenty minutes and then we work again until lunch. Sometimes I do language until our assembly and after play I do the rest of my language work until lunch time. After lunch I start on my maths until we tidy up at about 2.40pm for our story. We finish at 3.00pm. I have my tea at about 5.40pm. I have a bath and watch TV and go to bed at about 9.30pm.
